title: Enacts the H1N1 in the workplace prevention act
summary: Enacts the H1N1 in the workplace prevention act requiring employers to post a sign on prevention of the H1N1 flu in the workplace; authorizes the commissioner of health to promulgate rules and regulations related to prevention of the H1N1 flu virus in the workplace.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the "H1N1 in the workplace prevention act"
